Title: Pickles
Plot: When SpongeBob's enemy, Bubble Bass, comes in and orders a Krabby Patty, SpongeBob forgets to put the pickles in. Then, his whole world turns upside-down, literally. He even forgets how to make a Krabby Patty. Can he ever show his face in the Krusty Krab again?
Director: Alan Smart, Walt Dohrn, Sherm Cohen
Writer: Steven Fonti, Chris Mitchell, Peter Burns
